news.title: BENT SEA (MEGADETH, ABORTED, NAPALM DEATH) Grinds Hard On New Single "A Scopic Radiance"
news.summary:
Do you need some grindcore in your life? Great! Bent Sea has you covered for about 70 seconds. 
 The post  BENT SEA (MEGADETH, ABORTED, NAPALM DEATH) Grinds Hard On New Single "A Scopic Radiance"  appeared first on  Metal Injection .
